title: What if you had your very own T-1000 terminator to obey your orders? What would you do with it? - Quora

response.answer_text: First, to destroy every member of ISIS, Hezbollah, and other terrorist organizations that I named. Also all the drug cartels. I'd offer to spare the lives of the cartel people, but it would cost them most of their ill- gotten loot. I'd send it to visit North Korea, and to babysit their leader, while his people scrap his complete arsena. When it left, it could tell him to retire, take 1 million from their treasury, and move to Mexico. It would tell him that if he failed to behave, “I'll be back.”
